name: UCL_NDC_CODES
description: The UCL_NDC_CODES table contains information about NDC codes for universal charge records.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the charge record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_ID
columns.description: The medication national drug codes associated with the charge.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_ADMIN_AMT
columns.description: Administered amount for associated national drug code.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Unit associated with NDC administered amount.
